value.0: No other beings have as great an understanding of Death as we do. There is no great mystery, no facet of existence that affects every moment more than the fact that existence always ends. To understand this fully would render one omniscient.
Everyone who isn't us are oblivious fools.
They spent too much time cultivating their image as martyrs to get involved with something that truly matters; they lack direction.
Slippery as eels, the Tremere are guilty of the same crime as we, yet they mire themselves in the same politics that damn them.
No good can come of a Kindred who claims lies as his sire.
This blighted clan has proved dangerously adept at uncovering secrets, Make no enemies among them, lest you become the subject of their attentions.
The insight they offer is rarely worth the excruciating company they provide; I wonder if the "madness" is a simple sham to reduce their foes' defences.
They'll stab you in the back, but that's because they know how Kindred games are played.
Ultimately forgettable; we rarely cross paths.
Although they hail from the lands of the dead, there is little we can glean from them without tainting ourselves in the process.
So much noise, and yet so little signal.
Their recent changes in disposition make me nervous.

We are a Family. It is this blood that makes our clan so impregnably loyal, it is this blood that makes treachery such an unthinkable act amongst our clan. Amongst the vampire clans, we are of the more, if not most, rigidly controlled; contact between our members being constantly maintained. Only members of our family are allowed for the embrace, receiving the proxy kiss when they are seen fit. Three members of each generation are chosen as children to be Embraced when they are ready, and carefully raised to prepare them for it. Others in the family may be Embraced later in their lives, as a reward for excellent service.

Our weakness lies in our kiss -- it comes to each mortal accompanied by the excruciating pain of our curse. Because of this, we find it extremely difficult to feed from humans without bringing them to death, often do they die from shock before blood loss. However, we have found ways around this, feeding from the corpses of the recently deceased and retaining several other resources at which we may find blood to our leisure.

Legend has it the clan founder hoped to bolster his own power by Embracing a coven of venetian necromancers. This coven was actually a tightly-knit family of Giovanni who had strong trade interests in the mediterranean region. The Giovanni repaid their sire for his gift by slaying him and all his other descendants. Vampires from around the world reacted with fear and horror, and many joined together to hunt us. After almost a century of intermittent warfare, we made peace with our foes by promising to maintain a low profile and keep out of kindred politics. The Giovanni clan has apparently maintained its pledge to this day.
Would you like to learn about what they do or train in the next level?
Which of these do you want to train in?
Not a means to an end, but an end itself.
A useful discipline in the right hands.
Strength is an asset to anyone.

Potence - Grants you supernatural strength.
Dominate - Overwhelm another person's mind with the vampire's will, forcing victims to think or act according to the vampire's decree.
Necromancy - A form of blood magic that deals exclusively with the world of the dead: wraiths and the Shadowlands.

We favor homes of intrigue, where the evidence of our wealth prospers. Whether it be a mansion, palatial home, or a castle, we are happy wherever there is luxury, and often share these homes amongst the family. However, very few of us do not hone havens within the the tombs and sewers of cities where we may retreat to practice our dark arts.
I would like to learn the next level.
